steps.title: sensitizing
steps.image: TO:DO - find image for Brain Sensitizing Image
steps.description1: Feeling your body while doing yoga and/or mediation in order to bring your mind to the present moment
steps.description2: To help minimize emotions, past and future thoughts by bringing the mind into the present moment

trainings.title: Belly Button Healing
trainings.explanation: Belly Button Healing is a gentle massage for your gut using the Belly Button Healing wand. Try this 10 minute routine of continuous Belly Button Healing and experience the gut healing, muscle relaxing, and mind calming benefits this method has to offer.

trainings.title: Brain Wave Vibration
trainings.explanation: Brain Wave Vibration is an exercise unique to Brain Education. It can help you reduce stress and clear heaviness and/or fogginess from your brain. Try this 10 minute routine to experience Brain Wave Vibration.

trainings.title: Chakra Healing
trainings.explanation: Have you ever tried or heard of Chakra Vocal Toning? It's a technique of creating vocal sounds to alter the energy frequency of your chakras. Try this 10 minute chakra vocal toning routine with Jen, a Brain Education instructor and energy guide from Sedona Wellness Cafe.
